    • Uses of RowScanner in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner

      Classes in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner that implement RowScanner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoundedRowScanner
      A Scanner that constraints concurrent requests with a Semaphore.
      class  InstrumentedRowScanner
      A RowScanner that is instrumented with Metrics.
      class  RowScannerProxy
      Client for scanning over a selection of rows.

      Constructors in com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.scanner with parameters of type RowScanner 
      Constructor and Description
      BoundedRowScanner(RowScanner scanner, Semaphore semaphore)
      Creates a new BoundedRowScanner for the given underlying RowScanner, constrained by the given Semaphore.
      InstrumentedRowScanner(RowScanner scanner, ScannerInstrumentation metrics)
      Creates a new InstrumentedRowScanner for the given underlying RowScanner, instrumented using the given HBaseInstrumentation.
